titleStmt.title: The life of the dutches of Suffolke As it hath beene divers and sundry times acted, with good applause.
titleStmt.author: Drue, Thomas, fl. 1616-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by A. M[athewes] for Iasper Emery; at the Flowerdeluce in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and place of publication from STC.
The running title reads: The dutches of suffolke.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
